title: Genotype–phenotype correlation of SQSTM1 variants in patients with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
details: S Wang, Q Jiang, X Zheng, Q Wei, J Lin, T Yang… - Journal of Medical Genetics, 2024
abstract: Background Several variants of sequestosome 1 (SQSTM1) were screened in patients with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS), while the pathogenicity and genotype–phenotype correlation remains unclear. Methods We screened variants of …
